directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the chicken, celery, mango, water chestnuts, pineapple, mandarin oranges, mayonnaise, sour cream and coconut extract. Mix together well and refrigerate 1 to 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 2 cups diced cooked chicken breast meat
1 cup juice packed mandarin oranges, drained
title: Tropical Chicken Salad
